entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Visual studio ignoring docker file #58064
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #58054
  • FromAnywhere or FromRequest model binder #58053
  • Blazor RootComponent Dispose does not remove event handler for JS Interop #58051
    Backlog

Closed

  • Migrating .NET 7 to 8 with gRPC - The antiforgery token could not be decrypted #58059
  • [GB18030] There is an additional letter "j" when press the "Tab" key multiple times in a MVC project using Chinese characters as the project name. #57983
  • In Blazor WASM with with Open ID Connect how can you force an Auth/ID Token refresh #58058
  • Missing call to AddAuthorization() in Blazor Auto interactivity template #58039
  • How to run an async method when a property in a child control is changed? #57851
  • Blazor InteractiveServer APP:[PackageId].lib.module.js in RCL cannot reflect change #58050
  • [Blazor][net9] System.InvalidOperationException: Multiple constructors accepting all given argument types have been found in type 'Component'. There should only be one applicable constructor #58004
  • Perf regression: fortunes, https #58020
  • JsonOptions Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi formatting #57891

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #58065
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] Stop using Mac 11 in Helix #58063
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.x
  • Disable automated inter-branch merges #58061
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/9.0] Mark API from 9 as shipped #58060
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Bump rollup from 4.18.1 to 4.22.4 #58049
    area-infrastructure, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #57942
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0-rc2' => 'release/9.0' #57975
    area-infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Use System.Threading.Lock in Kestrel #57236
    community-contribution, area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Revert "Unquarantine ServerReset_BeforeRequestBody_ClientBodyThrows" #58043
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add a note about when to validate ping payloads #57795
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Feature/httpendpoint #57565
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • throw an exception on id.get if session is not available #57902
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Allow same version when updating versions in node packages #57921
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix up OpenAPI schema handling and support concurrent requests #58024
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Rename SourceBuildUseMonoRuntime property, which is not SB specific #58035
    area-infrastructure
  • Removing unsafe code in BufferExtensions #57417
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Add explicit conversion for value-type returning handlers with filters #57966
    Servicing-consider, area-minimal, feature-rdf, 8.0.x
  • ApiExplorer Support for HttpResults types for Controllers #57464
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
